title: Looking for a support  main (Silver +) to fill in for our team

replies.body: Gold 4 atm but climbing, Can play all supports. If you still need a support message me
Gold 4 atm, hit me up, any sup except janna/zilean
A solid support but cant get out of bronze.. Can play all support champs give me a try you wont be disappointed.
Would be interested, see my post or message me.

Currently Silver 2 :)
I own and can play all support champions (But i dislike taric and Zilean). My favourites to play are: Lulu, Sona, Thresh, Leona, Braum, Alistair :)

Yeh ill do it 
I LOVE sona 
Leona, alistar are easy to play so yeh. and support main aha
